quote: Romanticism is the abuse of adjectives
author: Alfred de Musset

quote: To fall in love with someone's thoughts - the most intimate, splendid romance.
author: Sanober Khan

quote: We all romanticize the people we adore.
author: John Green

quote: Romance is the sweetening of the soulWith fragrance offered by the stricken heart.
author: Wole Soyinka,  The Lion and the Jewel

quote: Romance has been elegantly defined as the offspring of fiction and love.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I'm a romantic; a sentimental person thinks things will last, a romantic person hopes against hope that they won't.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: To say the word Romanticism is to say modern art - that is, intimacy, spirituality, color, aspiration towards the infinite, expressed by every means available to the arts.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Romance is the glamour which turns the dust of everyday life into a golden haze.
author: Elinor Glyn

quote: What the world stigmatizes as romantic is often more nearly allied to the truth than is commonly supposed.
author: Anne Brontë

quote: I’m a romantic. I like cold coffee and orgasms that arrive fifteen minutes after I’ve put on my clothes and paid the lady.
author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..

quote: Any kind of novelty or excitement drives up dopamine in the brain, and dopamine is associated with romantic love.
author: Helen Fisher

quote: A lot of men wouldn't like being called a romantic. It's not macho enough.'Quite often men are fools.
author: P.C. Cast,  Goddess of Light

quote: If we spoke with our ears, and listened through our mouth, then a kiss might be the most romantic sound in the world.
author: Jarod Kintz,  American Association for the Advancement of Aardvarks Presents: Dear Natalie

quote: Tennis is the only sport with love in the score, and that makes it the most romantic. I would be a player, but I wisely use the net to go fishing instead.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Love is like a portable lamp/sex toy. The world calls those flashlights, but I’m much more romantic.
author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.

quote: Love flows like flowers, and grows like water. I’m so thirsty for romance I could drink a dozen roses.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Romance is thinking about your significant other, when you are supposed to be thinking about something else.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: The roses of romance grow when you water your relationship with gratitude. Love will bloom and blossom when you recognize the awesome.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: I don't think I'm romantic at all. I have a lot of faith in the right thing happening. I don't really hope for a lot of particulars, I just have faith that the right thing will happen most of the time.
author: Juliana Hatfield

quote: Kiss me with love like a butterfly kisses flowers to find and taste the nectar of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Soul mate romance dissolves the superficial and touches your deepest heart with the delightful power of love.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Romance is the deepest thing in life. It is deeper than reality.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Only a struggle twists sentimentality and lust together into love.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: A turtle is like a lizard in a bicycle helmet, and I think that’s romantic. That reminds me, I should write a love song called, “Dinner for two—plus one.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: The very essence of romance is uncertainty.
author: Oscar Wilde,  The Importance of Being Earnest and Other Plays

quote: I'm not sentimental--I'm as romantic as you are. The idea, you know,is that the sentimental person thinks things will last--the romanticperson has a desperate confidence that they won't.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  This Side of Paradise

quote: The romantics would call this a love story, the cynics would call it a tragedy. In my mind it’s a little bit of both, and no matter how you choose to view it in the end, it does not change the fact that it involves a great deal of my life and the path I’ve chosen to follow.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook

quote: I said I made a special trip to get her favorite item, because it sounded more romantic than admitting I randomly had it already. Now that’s love.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Romance takes place in the middle distance. Romance is looking in at yourself through a window clouded with dew. Romance means leaving things out: where life grunts and shuffles, romance only sighs.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: I’ve become skeptical of the unwritten rule that just because a boy and girl appear in the same feature, a romance must ensue. Rather, I want to portray a slightly different relationship, one where the two mutually inspire each other to live - if I’m able to, then perhaps I’ll be closer to portraying a true expression of love.
author: Hayao Miyazaki

quote: A flowing flurry of flowers fell to the floor when I fell in love, as if my heart were a garden that gushed forth and flooded her being with the fragrance of romance.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: The sun rose and tinted the sky rose, that floral red teeming with romance, and it filtered in thoughts of the love I used to have for her.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Romantic haste in drama bringstears and sighs when the hero diesbut the curtain fall is finalwhen in life we take the tragic wayThe sunset too is a glorious thingbut with it ends the day.
author: C. P. Klapper,  The Washington Poems

quote: I really don't see anything romantic in proposing. It is very romantic to be in love. But there is nothing romantic about a definite proposal. Why, one may be accepted. One usually is, I believe. Then the excitement is all over. The very essence of romance is uncertainty. If ever I get married, I'll certainly try to forget the fact.
author: Oscar Wilde,  The Importance of Being Earnest

quote: My love has a flow like a flower, so it’s best if you water it with the fragrance of romance, which has the aroma of loyalty.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: In romance, we feel the need to zoom in and expound on our partner's foibles in intimate detail; in friendship, we tend to do the opposite, avoiding confrontation through fear, lethargy or both.
author: Mariella Frostrup

quote: Flowers are aromatic and romantic, and they grow exactly the way love does—with plenty of light, and watered with affection.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: It is beautiful to express love and even more beautiful to feel it.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: I had a dream about you. No words were exchanged, but we spoke with our eyes. My eyes said, “I love you,” while your eyes told me, “I’m asleep.” You always were more romantic than me.
author: Jarod Kintz,  I had a dream about you 2

quote: Cynics are simply thwarted romantics.
author: William Goldman,  The Princess Bride

quote: When one is in love, one always begins by deceiving one's self, and one always ends by deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance.
author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: Cherish sunsets, wild creatures and wild places. Have a love affair with the wonder and beauty of the earth.
author: Stewart Udall

quote: One could argue that it's romantic to die for love. Of course, then you're dead and unable to take that honeymoon trip to the Alps with all the other fashionable young couples, which is a shame.
author: Libba Bray,  A Great and Terrible Beauty

quote: Flowers bloom in the tranquility of love with a beautiful desire for the well-being of the earth.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Read her poetry before you make love to her. That way she’ll be asleep when you do. I’m as romantic as a rocking chair with wheels.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: We live in a dark and romantic and quite tragic world.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Roses! I swear you men have all your romance from the same worn book. Flowers are a good thing, a sweet thing to give a lady. But it is always roses, always red, and always perfect hothouse blooms when they can come by them.
author: Patrick Rothfuss,  The Name of the Wind

quote: Let’s be romantic and dance in the rain. I’ll prove my feelings for you by bringing an umbrella, because I’m drowning in my love for you.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: She plants love, and she grows roses. The fragrance of romance comes from the blossom that blooms in the heart.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Love is the most potent drug used to seduce anyone.
author: Debasish Mridha
